page.title: 09SCHOOL, Y PANT COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: {LANDSCAPE/BUILDINGS:}Site equidistant Talbot Green Miskin Llantrisant, at the side of R. Clun. Large playing fields, running track and specially planted trees on south side as memorials. Buildings originally brick 1957 but new extensions of alumina mixture, of two storeys.{ {HISTORY:}1957 opened as Secondary Modern, 1972 became Lower School of Bryn Celynnog, 1977 all ability 11-18 Comprehensive School in its own right. {SIZE:}About 800 pupils, with 720 up to form V and the rest staying for 2 years in form V1. Besides places above pupils come from Llanhari, Llanharan, Groesfaen. {ORGANISATION:}5 house system based on local historical sites: Arfau, Caerau, Gwanaf, Maelwg, Trecastell. Teaching groups mixed ability form 1, banding form 2, strict setting form 3 on.
